mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(a.orderDate) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND YEAR(a.orderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS monthsSalesNum, SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(a.orderDate) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND YEAR(a.orderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) THEN a.totalPrice ELSE 0 END) AS monthSalesPrice, SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(a.orderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND WEEK(a.orderDate, 1) = WEEK(CURDATE(), 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS weekSalesNum, SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(a.orderDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND WEEK(a.orderDate, 1) = WEEK(CURDATE(), 1) THEN a.totalPrice ELSE 0 END) AS weekSalesPrice, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(a.orderDate) = CURDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS daySalesNum, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(a.orderDate) = CURDATE() THEN a.totalPrice ELSE 0 END) AS daySalesPrice FROM xs_order a WHERE a.isDelete = 0 AND a.type = 0;
